game_description: OceanCraft is a Virtual Reality game about surviving on a self build vehicle on the ocean. Survive the dangers of the ocean - alone - or with your friends. !!! Early-Access Release !!! Currently you have about three hours of gameplay We are gradually adding more and more content around our core game mechanics – crafting – surviving and mulitplayering. There is already a lot to do inside OceanCraft: - Survive alone or with your friends (cross platform multiplayer) - Collect trash from the ocean - Build you own base with pallets, walls, tables, chests, etc. - Grow and harvest plants - Fish fish with your fishing rod - Cut and grill fish and vegetables - Craft multiple helpful or decorative items and tools - Have multiple different save games/build vehicles - Play private games with your friends, or open a public game and connect with other OceanCrafters - Ingame voice chat - Fight against hunger and thirst - Collect materials by shooting balloons with your slingshot - Find
review_1: Great little co-op survival game - didn't notice any glitch mentioned in some other reviews - maybe I play it differently or maybe its been fixed. Could do with a bit more to do though and in terms of jeopardy the pirates and storms are mildly challenging to start with but as you progress, things maybe need to go up a notch as they become easy to manage. For the price point though - easily worth 5 stars. More games like this please :D
review_2: The game is very fun with friends and on your own, except that when you leave your headset and it turns off the game restarts and w when you load your save everything is gone in chests, work benches, etc and it is really annoying. Please fix this glitch in next update.
review_3: 3 stars due to a bug I'll explain bellow. Like some previous reviews mentioned, the game runs out of new things to do rather quickly, but still it's a blast to play in multiplayer. No matter the issues, it's worth the cost to play with friends. That said - I'd give it 5 stars if I hadn't ran into a bug. Around day 100 all our stuff disappeared. Everything, mugs, things in chests, bottles, all gone. We thought we'd continue playing and just collect new resources, but my buddies couldn't plant things or see the things I've planted. We've tried a few things, but nothing helped, so we had to abandon the game :/
review_4: So for the first few hours it was SUPER good like $60 game good at times but today when I opened it it kept sending me back to my home and everything I did didn’t work it kept crashing and I still have 60 Gb of free storage and its updated but it just won’t work so idk if it’s the games fault or metas fault but otherwise it’s a good game.
review_5: The first couple hours was fun but. Then it felt like I ran out of things to do there’s no story I think the island should be actual islands and
